notes: Note: if the mozzarella is added to hot pasta it will melt and get stringy, so store it separately, which will make reheating the pasta easier
recipe: Boil the pasta following the directions, then for the last two minutes, add the frozen vegetable to the boiling pasta
Drain and return to the pot - immediately mix with pesto and red pepper flakes and wait to slightly cool
Serve the pasta and top with the diced tomato and mozzarella!
